puzzle.help: 1. Link the Coffee cup with two sugar cubes. 2. The link should be T-shaped: two sugar cubes must be connected with a straight line and the cup forms the middle segment. 3. In some levels (when notified in the top right corner), this variant means you can also link two coffees and one sugar. Both configurations are good.

levels.level: C S` S S ` C ` C ` S SS`
